faqs.title: How can I participate in an auction?
faqs.content: You need to deposit money into your wallet. If the amount in your wallet is greater than the bid amount you place, your bid will be valid. However, you will not be charged if you do not win the auction.

faqs.title: How can I withdraw my money?
faqs.content: You need to submit a withdrawal request. However, if you are currently participating in an auction, your request will be temporarily held until the auction ends.

faqs.title: Can I cancel my bid after placing it?
faqs.content: No, all bids placed on Koi Auction are considered final and binding. Please ensure you are prepared to complete the purchase if your bid wins.

faqs.title: Are there any guarantees or refunds after delivery?
faqs.content: If there is an issue during transportation, a 100% refund will be provided.

faqs.title: What happens if I win an auction?
faqs.content: If you win the auction, the system will automatically complete the payment through your wallet.
